title: England hammered by West Indies in first T20 of five-match series
description: England's batting woes cross formats and continents as they are routed by West Indies in the first T20 international in Barbados.

title: ‘His voice became my constant companion’ – how Dan Johnson kept his dad’s memory alive
description: Dan Johnson's project capturing his father's voice made him consider the importance of preserving memories.

title: Man in court charged with murder of Freda Walker, 86
description: Freda Walker died at her home in Derbyshire and her husband Ken is in a critical condition.

title: UK must do more to support Ukraine - Commons Defence Chair
description: Putin is taking advantage of 'weakened West' says Tobias Ellwood, with Ukraine's invasion 'imminent'.

title: MP blackmail claims: Tory William Wragg to meet police
description: William Wragg says he will speak to the Met after alleging MPs wanting to oust the PM had faced threats.

title: Australian Open: Dan Evans loses to Felix Auger-Aliassime in Melbourne
description: Dan Evans is unable to match his best run at the Australian Open as defeat by ninth seed Felix Auger-Aliassime ends British interest in the singles.

title: Chris Boardman to lead bid to get more people cycling and walking
description: The ex-Olympic champion will encourage more people to cycle and walk as head of Active Travel England.

title: First-time buyers surge: 'I couldn't keep paying rent'
description: There were a record number of first-time buyers in 2021, figures from lender Halifax suggest.

title: Inflation rate: How it affects you, beer and bacon sandwiches
description: A beginners' guide to inflation rates and what it means to you and your night out.

title: Covid: Some learners face 10-month wait for driving test
description: A shortage of examiners means some learners face eight-hour round trips to do their practical exam.

title: US police hunt monkeys missing after motorway crash
description: The monkeys were being transported to a lab in Florida but escaped after the accident in Pennsylvania.

title: The roller-skating group tackling loneliness
description: Skate Social Belfast regularly meets at well-known city landmarks, including Titanic Belfast.

title: Robot vacuum cleaner escapes from Cambridge Travelodge
description: The automated vacuum device ignores a hotel door's threshold and makes a break for freedom.

title: The heavyweight title fight that has it all - UFC 270 Ngannou v Gane preview
description: Sparring stories, former coaches, contract disputes & former friends - Francis Ngannou's heavyweight title fight against Ciryl Gane at UFC 270 has it all.

description: There are tributes to Meat Loaf on the front pages alongside more stories on the Downing Street parties row.

title: Arnold Schwarzenegger involved in Los Angeles car crash
description: The actor's spokesman confirmed that he was driving the SUV involved in the crash.

title: Covid: Booster study finds Omicron protection and Ireland lifts rules
description: Five things you need to know about the coronavirus pandemic this Saturday.

title: Kiribati goes into first lockdown after Covid flight cases
description: Until last week, the remote island nation of Kiribati had recorded just two Covid cases.

title: UN condemns deadly air strike on Yemen prison
description: A Saudi-led coalition denies it struck a detention centre on Friday, killing more than 70 people.

title: Kenya's River Yala: Mystery and heartbreak of the dead bodies
description: At least 19 corpses have been found dumped in western Kenya and relatives want to know how they died.

description: One resident returns to their home city in rebel-held east Ukraine, as tensions with Russia rise.

title: ‘Hi, thanks for calling. Are you OK? How far away are you?’
description: A telephone helpline launched in Edinburgh is keeping people company when they walk home alone.

title: Week in pictures: 15 - 21 January 2022
description: A selection of powerful images from all over the globe, taken this week.

title: Police response to £3.9m fraud branded woeful
description: Inspectorate criticises the police after only one of 69 victims of a fraud has their case investigated.

title: Connecting people through music
description: The World Harmony Orchestra has been providing musical comfort for those who may be lonely throughout the pandemic.

title: Ros Atkins On... China's zero-Covid dilemma
description: Ros Atkins examines China's Covid elimination strategy, while others are learning to live with the virus.
